professional_summary: A versatile and dynamic manager and marketing professional with more than 20 years of sales, management, marketing and promotional experience. A goal oriented and trusted leader with strong communication skills and ability to motivate teams.

work_experience.description: Co-founded and developed a full service marketing agency specializing in event/experiential marketing
responsibilities: Built and developed company's overall objectives and strategies
Created company capabilities documentation and presentation materials
Presented strategic marketing plans to prospective clients
Managed field teams and project budgets

work_experience.description: Managed transition of in-house event marketing to external agency structure
responsibilities: Implemented consumer engagement promotions focused on music festivals
Led supplier destruction process for non-compliant materials

work_experience.description: Managed strategic event marketing programs in major sales territory
